title: On Generalized Rectangular Fuzzy Model for Assessment
abstract: The article is dedicated to the analysis of the existing models for assessment based of the fuzzy logic centroid technique. A new Generalized Rectangular Model were developed. Some generalizations of the existing models are offered.
